title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
### Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - Your Ultimate Bug Control Solution

**Protect Your Home, Garden, and Business with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster!**

**Product Highlights:**
- **3 Packs, 30 Feet Each**: Ideal for extensive coverage in residential, commercial, and industrial settings.
- **Pre-Baited & Ready to Use**: Simply hang and catch those pesky insects!
- **Indoor & Outdoor Use**: Suitable for a variety of environments, from barns to waste rooms and beyond.
- **Scented Green Color**: Attracts flies and other insects with a powerful, yet non-toxic scent.
- **Sticky Adhesive Barn Paper Sheet**: Disposables designed for easy cleanup and efficient pest management.
- **Non-Toxic & Safe**: Perfect for areas where safety is a priority.
- **Up to One Year Longevity**: Provides continuous protection for up to 3600 square inches of coverage area.
- **Durable & Effective**: Tested in various field conditions, including damp and humid areas.
- **Versatile Applications**: Ideal for residential, commercial, industrial, barns, waste rooms, and animal farms.
- **Intelligent Pest Management**: A smarter way to control insect infestations.

**Why Choose the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster?**
- **Ease of Use**: Simply hang the traps and let them do the work.
- **Field-Tested Durability**: Proven effectiveness in various conditions.
- **Safe for All Environments**: Non-toxic and safe for use in areas where traditional rodenticides or snap traps are unsuitable.
- **Wide Coverage Area**: Protect up to 3600 square inches with just one trap.
- **Versatile Applications**: Suitable for a wide range of locations and infestation levels.

**Make Your Home, Garden, and Business Bug-Free with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster.** Order now and start enjoying a pest-free environment!

**Key Features at a Glance:**
- **Pack Quantity**: 3
- **Length per Pack**: 30 feet
- **Scented Green Color**: Attracts flies and other insects
- **Material**: Sticky adhesive barn paper sheet
- **Disposal**: Easy to use and dispose of
- **Non-Toxic**: Safe for all environments
- **Effective Duration**: Up to one full year
- **Coverage Area**: 3600 square inches
- **Suitable Locations**: Residential, commercial, industrial, barns, waste rooms, animal farms
- **Usage Conditions**: Normal conditions, damp areas, humid areas

Join the countless satisfied customers who are enjoying a pest-free environment with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster. Order now and take control of your pest management!

---

*Note: For best results, follow the product instructions and keep out of reach of children and pets.*
